#summary General installation steps for new users
#labels Phase-Deploy

= Step 1 =

Install Sweetcron lifestreaming software - http://code.google.com/p/sweetcron/

= Step 2 =

Download the latest SocialCubes release - http://code.google.com/p/socialcubes-theme/downloads/list

= Step 3 =

Expand and place the 'socialcubes' directory inside your Sweetcron installation system/application/views/themes

= Step 4 =

Activate the theme from the Admin > Options > Theme (drop down menu)
